title: Sebastopol
name: Sebastopol Farmers' Market
directions: Take Hwy 116 through Sebastopol; it's in the middle of town
content: The Sebastopol Farmers' Market takes place in the Sebastopol Plaza year-round. There is always live music and a wide of assortment of food to nosh on. Farmers and ranchers sell fresh local fruit, vegetables, cheese, eggs, and baked goods, and locally-produced body products and crafts that are hand-made by local artisans are also on sale.
